attributes.description: This dashboard provides an overview of user activity, alerts and resource in Azure cloud.

query.esql:
FROM logs-*
| STATS `total` = COUNT_DISTINCT(cloud.resource_id)

FROM logs-*
| STATS `total` = COUNT_DISTINCT(cloud.resource_id)

FROM logs-*
| STATS `total` = COUNT_DISTINCT(cloud.resource_id)

FROM logs-*
| STATS `total` = COUNT_DISTINCT(user.name)

FROM logs-*
| STATS `total` = COUNT_DISTINCT(user.name)

FROM logs-*
| STATS `total` = COUNT_DISTINCT(user.name)

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "Administrative"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "Administrative"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "Administrative"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "Alert"
| STATS `activated` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Activated", 1, 0)), `resolved_succeeded` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Resolved" OR azure.result.type == "Succeeded", 1, 0)) BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "Alert"
| STATS `activated` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Activated", 1, 0)), `resolved_succeeded` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Resolved" OR azure.result.type == "Succeeded", 1, 0)) BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "Alert"
| STATS `activated` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Activated", 1, 0)), `resolved_succeeded` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Resolved" OR azure.result.type == "Succeeded", 1, 0)) BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.operation.name LIKE "*LISTKEYS*"
| STATS `success` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Success" OR azure.result.type == "Succeeded", 1, 0)), `failure` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Failure" OR azure.result.type == "Failed", 1, 0)) BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.operation.name LIKE "*LISTKEYS*"
| STATS `success` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Success" OR azure.result.type == "Succeeded", 1, 0)), `failure` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Failure" OR azure.result.type == "Failed", 1, 0)) BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.operation.name LIKE "*LISTKEYS*"
| STATS `success` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Success" OR azure.result.type == "Succeeded", 1, 0)), `failure` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Failure" OR azure.result.type == "Failed", 1, 0)) BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.identity.authorization.action LIKE "*delete*"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `resource_type` = cloud.provider, `deletions` = azure.identity.authorization.action
| WHERE `resource_type` IS NOT NULL
| WHERE `deletions` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.identity.authorization.action LIKE "*delete*"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `resource_type` = cloud.provider, `deletions` = azure.identity.authorization.action
| WHERE `resource_type` IS NOT NULL
| WHERE `deletions` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.identity.authorization.action LIKE "*delete*"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `resource_type` = cloud.provider, `deletions` = azure.identity.authorization.action
| WHERE `resource_type` IS NOT NULL
| WHERE `deletions` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "ServiceHealth"
| STATS `active` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Active", 1, 0)), `resolved` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Resolved", 1, 0)) BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "ServiceHealth"
| STATS `active` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Active", 1, 0)), `resolved` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Resolved", 1, 0)) BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "ServiceHealth"
| STATS `active` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Active", 1, 0)), `resolved` = SUM(CASE(azure.result.type == "Resolved", 1, 0)) BY `time_bucket` = bucket(@timestamp, 50, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| SORT `time_bucket` ASC

FROM logs-*
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `top_active_users` = user.email
| WHERE `top_active_users` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `top_active_users` = user.email
| WHERE `top_active_users` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `top_active_users` = user.email
| WHERE `top_active_users` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.identity.authorization.action LIKE "*write*"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `resource_type` = cloud.provider, `creations` = azure.identity.authorization.action
| WHERE `resource_type` IS NOT NULL
| WHERE `creations` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.identity.authorization.action LIKE "*write*"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `resource_type` = cloud.provider, `creations` = azure.identity.authorization.action
| WHERE `resource_type` IS NOT NULL
| WHERE `creations` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.identity.authorization.action LIKE "*write*"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `resource_type` = cloud.provider, `creations` = azure.identity.authorization.action
| WHERE `resource_type` IS NOT NULL
| WHERE `creations` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "ServiceHealth"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `category` = CASE(azure.result.type == "Active", "Active", azure.result.type == "Resolved", "Resolved", NULL)
| WHERE `category` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "ServiceHealth"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `category` = CASE(azure.result.type == "Active", "Active", azure.result.type == "Resolved", "Resolved", NULL)
| WHERE `category` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "ServiceHealth"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `category` = CASE(azure.result.type == "Active", "Active", azure.result.type == "Resolved", "Resolved", NULL)
| WHERE `category` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "Alert"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `category` = CASE(azure.result.type == "Activated", "Activated", azure.result.type == "Resolved", "Resolved", azure.result.type == "Succeeded", "Succeeded", NULL)
| WHERE `category` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "Alert"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `category` = CASE(azure.result.type == "Activated", "Activated", azure.result.type == "Resolved", "Resolved", azure.result.type == "Succeeded", "Succeeded", NULL)
| WHERE `category` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

FROM logs-*
| WHERE azure.category == "Alert"
| STATS `total` = COUNT() BY `category` = CASE(azure.result.type == "Activated", "Activated", azure.result.type == "Resolved", "Resolved", azure.result.type == "Succeeded", "Succeeded", NULL)
| WHERE `category` IS NOT NULL
| SORT `total` DESC

embeddableConfig.content:
### Azure Activity Logs (OpenTelemetry)

These dashboards provide a focused view of Azure control-plane activity collected via OpenTelemetry.

- **Overview**: high-level activity trends, access requests, alert/service health status, and resource operation patterns.
- **Users**: user-centric activity, authorization behavior, and the most active identities.
- **Alerts**: alert lifecycle monitoring (activated vs resolved/succeeded) and status distribution.

attributes.title: [Azure Activity OTEL] Activity Logs Overview
